channel.title: How would you feel if this turned out to be a hoax?
channel.description:
Would you shrug it off? Would you feel seriously let down?
The levels of hope and trust some of you have for this mod makes me wonder how devastating it would be if this was indeed a hoax.

item.title: How would you feel if this turned out to be a hoax?
item.dc:creator: brokenfridgehinge
item.description:
That’s what Hubi wants us to believe. But yeah, this thread has gone on for a bit too long, and never really served any useful purpose except more stupid baseless speculation.

Read full topic

item.title: How would you feel if this turned out to be a hoax?
item.dc:creator: doggie015
item.description:
I would not be surprised. Most people think it’s a hoax already. Unless they get a demo or beta they will always think it is a hoax and will ignore it after it is released because of what happened to DN:F.

The public has learned the hard way that vaporware after 7+ years = shitty result, no exceptions

item.title: How would you feel if this turned out to be a hoax?
item.dc:creator: Dr_Karamazov
item.description:
Yeah, seems like they’re scrapping episode 3 in favour of a full game. At least that’s what I’ve heard. But the idea of the entire new game taking place in some Arctic research base doesn’t seem great to me, especially after what’s come before.

Read full topic

item.title: How would you feel if this turned out to be a hoax?
item.dc:creator: Dr.Kleiner
item.description:
calhoun freeman:

How did it disappoint you? The series’ quality is quite top notch.

By disappointment, I mean only the fact of the delays in releasing new installments. I have been waiting for HL: Ep 3 forever. The end of Ep.2 was gut-wrenching!

Read full topic
item.source: How would you feel if this turned out to be a hoax?

item.title: How would you feel if this turned out to be a hoax?
item.dc:creator: Dr_Karamazov
item.description:
You people need to lighten up and take a joke. I would be really surprised if the devs are genuinely insulted and bawwing over this thread. If any dev would like to confirm this I would be interested to know if they can take jokes or are as dull as you two (previous posters)

Read full topic
item.source: How would you feel if this turned out to be a hoax?

item.title: How would you feel if this turned out to be a hoax?
item.dc:creator: ShadowNate
item.description:
Apollomasque:

/
I agree with that comment wholeheartedly and personally think this thread is a tad unnecessary.
It’s even kind of insulting to the people working on it.

That’s exactly how I feel too. And this is why it “feels” to some of us like we have seen this thread before, even though not specifically with this title.

Read full topic
item.source: How would you feel if this turned out to be a hoax?

item.title: How would you feel if this turned out to be a hoax?
item.dc:creator: Apollomasque
item.description:
danielsangeo:

At this juncture, with so much information and evidence that the mod actually does exist, what I’d need now to show that it is a hoax is some pretty solid evidence from those saying it’s a hoax.

I am so eager to play Black Mesa, it’s not even funny, but it’s a free mod so I can wait for it to be finished. If it never comes out and it is, indeed, a hoax, well, I wasn’t centering my life around waiting for BM anyway, so I’ll just move on.

/
I agree with that comment wholeheartedly and personally think this thread is a tad unnecessary.
It’s even kind of insulting to the people working on it.

Read full topic
item.source: How would you feel if this turned out to be a hoax?

item.title: How would you feel if this turned out to be a hoax?
item.dc:creator: orange_cat
item.description:
striker:

Wish there was an opportunity to hinder those saying “meh” and such now from playing the mod later and then listen to them whining in hell…

I wasn’t saying meh to the mod but saying meh if it turned out to be a hoax. I am looking forward to playing this mod, but I can’t feel disappointed in something I haven’t played.

Besides, meh makes up most of my opinions even when I should have an opinion, and is my default stance on anything.

doomyshadowsquirrels:

For how much excitement and appreciation there seems to be for BM, when a thread like this comes in, or that ‘How much would you pay’ thread, there is a dispoportionately huge concensus of ‘meh’ and ‘$10, nothing more.’

I’d bet on stubborn pride. I’ve followed BM for about a year and a half now, and I would personally be bummed to shit if it was a hoax, or somehow couldn’t be released.

This is one of the things I would probably pay full retail price for. (if i had the money)

Read full topic
item.source: How would you feel if this turned out to be a hoax?
